title: Coastal Cinnamon and Coconut Estate Between Galle and Weligama
details: Extremely attractive Cinnamon and Coconut estate which generates approximately LKR700,000 income per month on average. There is a harvest processing building with caretaker’s quarters on the estate. Direct access from good tarmac road. Lovely views across the rice fields and surrounding plantations. 6km drive to the Weligama beach, just a short walk to the lotus flower lake. Fabulous property and conveniently located close to Galle Fort and the surrounding coastal areas.
